game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: In this quest, you will embark on a thrilling adventure to find the long lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Along the way, you will encounter numerous challenges and solve puzzles to unravel the secrets of the treasure's location.
game.reward: Ancient artifact and a bag of gold coins

task.description: Travel to the ancient ruins and explore the tombs to uncover the ancient map that leads to the treasure.
Navigate through a treacherous cave system to find the hidden chamber where the key to the treasure is located.
Face a series of challenging riddles in order to access the room where the treasure is held.
